original_title: A Sombra Emergente de Uma Suspeita
overview: Amongst the victims’ names, his own.  The cassette tape that jams.  The telephone that rings.  The news of Lucinda coming.  The dinner burns to ashes.  The fans that roar and the oppressing heat.  Lima’s condition is deteriorating, and time no longer exists: all days are one. One lonely day.
title: The Emerging Shadow of a Suspicion
